name: Assault (Chapter 1) (Way To Kingdom)
description:
Gsoft Games presents "Assault (Chapter 1) (Way To Kingdom)." Gsoft Games always try to make something incredible and amazing. and now representing you the "Assault" .
Assault" A new beginning, a new story, a new adventure, comes with a lots of action, adventure, journey, faith, and much more. "Assault" is a chapter game and a complete story divided into different chapters and Now "Assault (Chapter 1)" is officially Releases ."
You can now play "Assault" offline. There is no need of anything  to run this game.  Just Download and play directly without any hesitation.
Download Now and Enjoy!
